answer/en: Help me, Obi-Wan Kenobi. You’re my only hope.
answer/es: I find your lack of faith disturbing.
answer/ca: The Force will be with you. Always.

answer/en: Why, you stuck-up, half-witted, scruffy-looking nerf herder!
answer/ca: Do. Or do not. There is no try.

answer/en: Just for once, let me look on you with my own eyes.
answer/ca: Well, if droids could think, there’d be none of us here, would there?
